body:
i'm thankful for this video of [conan o'brien hiking with kevin nealon](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mr_czMxFy1E).

i'm thankful for [the medical students who learn to do abortions using papayas](https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2017/dec/22/why-medical-students-are-practicing-abortions-on-papayas).

i'm thankful for how my pee smells after eating asparagus. i'm thankful that yesterday we boiled shrimp and ate them with asparagus and baguette for lunch. i'm thankful for cocktail sauce. i'm thankful to have had ice cream and potato chips for dinner.

i'm thankful for _cheapest weddings_, which is hilarious. i'm thankful for [this classic _flavor of love_ clip](https://twitter.com/blingspice/status/944681121543086080).

i'm thankful for [this episode of _thirst aid kit_ about keanu](https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/panoply/thirst-aid-kit/e/52326663) and for [this interview with jen gotch about her decision not to have children](http://outoflinepodcast.podbean.com/e/14-jen-gotch-on-not-having-children/).

i'm thankful for this season of _peaky blinders_, which ended very well. i'm thankful that d and i watched several interview compilations of cillian murphy and jamie dornan and then the movie they were being interviewed about, _anthropoid_, which was surprisingly quite good.

i'm thankful for [charlie](https://twitter.com/tkylemac/status/944035437424861184) [brown](https://twitter.com/JasonRitter/status/944446470446489600).

i'm thankful for [this photo of lou reed](https://twitter.com/dark_shark/status/944772221238575105) wearing a t-shirt with a photo of him on it, which you can see through his clear glass guitar.
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful for this video of [conan o'brien hiking with kevin nealon](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mr_czMxFy1E).

i'm thankful for [the medical students who learn to do abortions using papayas](https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2017/dec/22/why-medical-students-are-practicing-abortions-on-papayas).

i'm thankful for how my pee smells after eating asparagus. i'm thankful that yesterday we boiled shrimp and ate them with asparagus and baguette for lunch. i'm thankful for cocktail sauce. i'm thankful to have had ice cream and potato chips for dinner.

i'm thankful for _cheapest weddings_, which is hilarious. i'm thankful for [this classic _flavor of love_ clip](https://twitter.com/blingspice/status/944681121543086080).

i'm thankful for [this episode of _thirst aid kit_ about keanu](https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/panoply/thirst-aid-kit/e/52326663) and for [this interview with jen gotch about her decision not to have children](http://outoflinepodcast.podbean.com/e/14-jen-gotch-on-not-having-children/).

i'm thankful for this season of _peaky blinders_, which ended very well. i'm thankful that d and i watched several interview compilations of cillian murphy and jamie dornan and then the movie they were being interviewed about, _anthropoid_, which was surprisingly quite good.

i'm thankful for [charlie](https://twitter.com/tkylemac/status/944035437424861184) [brown](https://twitter.com/JasonRitter/status/944446470446489600).

i'm thankful for [this photo of lou reed](https://twitter.com/dark_shark/status/944772221238575105) wearing a t-shirt with a photo of him on it, which you can see through his clear glass guitar.
